description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nGreat Conjunction:
After your creatures are killed, they have a 25% chance to be resurrected with 50% {STAT_health} and gain a {CONDNAME_BUFF_BARRIER} that absorbs damage equal to 50% of their Maximum {STAT_health}. This trait does not stack.
name: Radiant Energy
